text.text: :wave: Hi *JSON Schema* Community! This is a quick recap of the best stuff of the week:
<https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JjAKtQGv1oM|*JSON Schema Validation*: A dating show between backend and frontend by Jorrik Klijnsma>
Thanks @micshar1992 for <https://github.com/json-schema-org/website/pull/157|this> tutorial for unnevaluatedItems to improve the JSON Schema docs!
*Past events: * Watch on Youtube the recording of the last Community Meeting `2023-10-16` <https://youtu.be/OKQnKIefRPA|Watch on Youtube>

*Upcoming events:* Join us next Monday `2023-10-23` for the next Open Community Working Meeting. <https://github.com/json-schema-org/community/issues/499|Agenda> | <https://postman.zoom.us/j/89562933116?pwd=OWlsQ0RrcDY4S1JQU2d2Q2M0aFFlZz09|Zoom Link>
We are actively looking for contributors! Please join #contribute to get involved.
Have a lovely weekend everyone! ğŸ«¶ğŸ«¶ğŸ½ğŸ«¶ğŸ¾
